name: rentverse-challenge
description: RentVerse - Mobile SecOps Challenge Final Submission

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd rentverse-backend && npm install && cd ../rentverse-frontend && npm install && cd ../rentverse-ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd rentverse-backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed
scripts.docs: cd rentverse-backend && npm start & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:3000/docs

author: RentVerse Team
